main event: An object was observed for 1 hour and 45 minutes with a pendulum swinging motion at an altitude of 10,000 feet.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 2-3 minutes initially before extending to nearly 2 hours.,The object was sighted at arm's length.,The possible explanations include a balloon, meteor, or aircraft.,The report does not contain any photographs.,The observation type was categorized as Ground-Visual.
